title: Coffee Plant Roaster
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee roaster and cafe with a vegetarian-friendly menu. Has marked vegan items which include salads, sandwiches, bagels, granola, house-made pastries. Fresh squeezed organic juice and local kombucha available. Staff is knowledgeable about vegan needs. Has Wi-Fi.
